abstract_text: A Mobile Tele-Medical Maintenance system (MTMM system) applying different IT methods to perform different functions for the tele-medical maintenance of large numbers of individuals. The MTMM system includes a system kernel residing on web servers, linked to a large number of peripheral units on the individuals. The kernel containing the collection of all the "Private Medical Web Sites" and "Personal Health Plans" of the individuals. The MTMM system periphery including walk-in care offices and intelligent physio-logical sensors that can communicate directly with the kernel's programs via the Internet or similar communication networks, preferably using the user's phone and its traditional interfaces, message display plus message voice, and push-button plus voice input. The system kernel controlling directly actuators in the periphery and using message display and message voice output of the telephone to interact with the individual.
title: SYSTEM TO MAINTAIN AND MANAGE HEALTH.
Neural network for processing arrays of data with existent topology, such as images, and application of the network

abstract_text: Described herein are methods, devices, and microprocessors useful for predicting a hypoglycemic event in a subject. The hypoglycemic predictive approach described herein utilizes information obtained from a data stream, e.g., frequently obtained glucose values (current and/or predicted), body temperature, and/or skin conductance, to predict incipient hypoglycemic events and to alert the user.
title: DEVICE FOR THE PREDICTION OF HYPOGLUCEMIC EVENTS.

abstract_text:
A method and apparatus for natural language interpretation are described. The invention includes
a schema and apparatus for storing, in digital, analog, or other machine-readable format, a
network of propositions formed of a plurality of text and/or non-text objects, and the steps of
retrieving a string of input text, and locating all associated propositions in the network for each
word in the input string. Embodiments of the invention also include optimization steps for
locating said propositions, and specialized structures for storing them in a ready access storage
area simulating human short-term memory. The schema and steps may also include structures
and processes for obtaining and adjusting the weights of said propositions to determine posterior
probabilities representing the intended meaning. Embodiments of the invention also include an
apparatus designed to apply an automated interpretation algorithm to automated voice response
systems and portable knowledge appliance devices.
title: Multi-dimensional method and apparatus for automated language interpretation

abstract_text: A system, method and computer program product are provided for detecting an unwanted message. First, an electronic mail message is received. Text in the electronic mail message is decomposed. Statistics associated with the text are gathered using a statistical analyzer. A neural network engine coupled to the statistical analyzer is taught to recognize unwanted messages based on statistical indicators. The statistical indicators are analyzed utilizing the neural network engine for determining whether the electronic mail message is an unwanted message.
title: Intelligent SPAM detection system using an updateable neural analysis engine

abstract_text: The computational cost of many statistical modeling algorithms is affected by the input/output (I/O) cost of accessing out-of-core training data. This is an important challenge for emerging data mining applications, where the amount of training data can be potentially enormous. A heuristic approach to this problem is described. This approach is based on constructing a simple probability model from the large training data set, and using this model to generate simulated pseudo data for some aspects of the statistical modeling procedure. This approach is illustrated in the context of building a Naive Bayes probability model with feature selection. Here, the usual algorithms would require numerous data scans over the massive training data set, but our heuristic obtains models of comparable accuracy with just two data scans.
title: Using simulated pseudo data to speed up statistical predictive modeling from massive data sets

assignee_name_current: [{"assignee_name": "\n    Iol Wuhan Information Technology Co ltd\n  "}]
abstract_text: The invention provides a human-computer co-translation system based on exclusive machine translation engine training, a human-computer co-translation method based on feedback training loop signals and a computer readable storage medium for realizing the method. The technical scheme of the invention comprises a source text input component, a semantic recognition module connected with the source text input component, a special machine translation engine training ring, a man-machine co-translation window, a difference comparison interface and a reverse comparison translation engine. According to the technical scheme, the result of machine translation can be utilized to the maximum extent, meanwhile, manual proofreading can be conducted on the translation result which is possibly wrong, the efficiency is guaranteed, and meanwhile, the accuracy is improved, so that the accurate time for manual translation intervention is provided, the translation efficiency can be guaranteed for large-scale corpus translation and the translation occasion with high accuracy requirements, and meanwhile, the translation accuracy is guaranteed.
title: Man-machine co-translation system and method based on exclusive machine translation engine training

abstract_text: Techniques are presented herein for improved search based on group relevance. The techniques include determining account node groups based on the interactions of accounts with content. When a search query is received from a particular account, the group(s) associated with that account are determined, and the content items determined to be relevant to other accounts in the group(s) are given higher relevance in the search results. In some embodiments, groups are determined using partitioning and/or queries can be rewritten based on the group(s).
title: Search based on group relevance

assignee_name_current: [{"assignee_name": "\n    Beijing ByteDance Network Technology Co Ltd\n  "}]
abstract_text: The embodiment of the application discloses a method and a device for identifying a class to which a vehicle belongs. One embodiment of the method comprises: acquiring a vehicle image to be identified; inputting the image of the vehicle to be identified into a pre-trained vehicle logo detection model to obtain vehicle logo information, wherein the brand comprises at least one vehicle series; inputting the image of the vehicle to be recognized into a pre-trained vehicle system detection model to obtain vehicle system information, wherein the vehicle system information is used for indicating a vehicle system to which the vehicle presented by the image of the vehicle to be recognized belongs; and generating vehicle type information based on the matching of the obtained vehicle logo information and the vehicle series information, wherein the vehicle type information is used for indicating the brand and the vehicle series to which the vehicle presented by the vehicle image to be identified belongs. According to the embodiment, the recognition accuracy rate under the application scene that the appearance of the vehicle is easy to be confused and the angle of the vehicle is rich is effectively improved, and then a guarantee is provided for recalling the result of high matching degree.
title: Method and device for identifying class to which vehicle belongs

abstract_text: According to a preferred embodiment of the present invention, provided is a machine reading-based question and answer method. The machine reading-based question and answer method comprises the steps of: receiving and analyzing a user question; selecting at least one document in at least one domain corresponding to the user question and searching for a passage which is a response candidate determined to be suitable for the user question in the selected at least one document; obtaining at least one correct answer candidate value by inputting the user question and the corresponding passage to each at least one machine reading-based question and answer unit; and determining whether the at least one correct answer candidate value is a correct answer.
title: Device and Method for Machine Reading Comprehension Question and Answer

assignee_name_current: [{"assignee_name": "\n    Panasonic Intellectual Property Corp of America\n  "}]
abstract_text: The invention relates to an open circuit voltage measuring method, an open circuit voltage measuring apparatus and a recording medium. The open circuit voltage measuring method of the invention detects the connection between the secondary battery and the charger; judging whether the state of the secondary battery is stable or not in the case where the connection is detected; measuring a first open-circuit voltage, which is an open-circuit voltage before charging of the secondary battery, in a case where it is judged that the state of the secondary battery is stable; instructing the charger to start charging of the secondary battery; detecting the end of charging of the secondary battery; determining whether a state of the secondary battery is stable, in a case where an end of charging of the secondary battery is detected; measuring a second open circuit voltage, which is an open circuit voltage after the secondary battery is charged, in a case where it is judged that the state of the secondary battery is stable; the end of charging of the secondary battery is notified to the user. According to this configuration, the open circuit voltage can be accurately measured without giving a psychological burden to the user.
title: Open circuit voltage measuring method, open circuit voltage measuring device, and recording medium

abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To highly accurately predict future influence of content transmitted on social media.SOLUTION: An influence prediction apparatus includes: means for finding out an influence evaluation value indicating future influence at present time of a transmitting user to be a user transmitting content on the basis of a feature value of the transmitting user by using a prediction model; means for finding out topicality of the content transmitted by the transmitting user at the present time as a topicality evaluation value; and means for adding weight at the present time which is calculated so as to be reduced in accordance with an increase of lapse time from the transmission time of the content up to the present time to the influence evaluation value, adding weight at the present time which is calculated so as to be increased in accordance with the increase of the lapse time to the topicality evaluation value and calculating and outputting a total evaluation value indicating the future influence of the content from the weighed influence evaluation value and the weighted topicality evaluation value.
title: Influence prediction apparatus, influence prediction method and program

abstract_text: A system for controlling a smart microphone includes a smart microphone configured to receive and transfer a voice of a user, the smart microphone including a plurality of buttons, a control server configured to, when the voice of the user is received through the smart microphone, convert the voice into a text, extract text, matching a command stored in a command database (DB), as a command from a converted text, and transfer a function corresponding to the extracted command to the user terminal, and a user terminal configured to receive a command from the control server to execute a function corresponding to the received command.
title: Server and system for controlling smart microphone

abstract_text: One kind being based on light-catalysed cobalt-base alloys processing method and processing platform, the processing method includes that chemical reaction process is optimized and revised and optimized and revised with mechanical arm polishing path, and chemical reaction process, which is optimized and revised, seeks the conditions such as optimal intensity of illumination and chemical addition agent proportion, temperature using establishing linear regression model (LRM) for different processing objects based on linear regression algorithmï¼Mechanical arm polishing path, which is optimized and revised, is adjusted polishing locus using tactful networkï¼The processing platform includesï¼Robot module, polishing station, polishing fluid adding set, industrial personal computer and memory.The beneficial effects of the present invention areï¼The amount bad fixed problem of the ultraviolet ray intensity and chemical addition agent of chemical reaction process, can effectively promote quality of finish in effective solution photocatalysis processï¼Mechanical arm polishing path is trained for different processing objects, the flexible bring trajectory error of polishing disk has been can effectively solve, has promoted the quality and efficiency of polishing.
title: One kind being based on light-catalysed cobalt-base alloys processing method and processing platform

abstract_text: The application provides a song processing method, a song processing device, song processing equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and the technical field of cloud; the method comprises the following steps: presenting a song recording interface in response to a singing instruction triggered based on the session interface; responding to a song recording instruction triggered based on the song recording interface, recording the song, and determining the reverberation effect of the corresponding recorded song; and responding to a song sending instruction, sending a target song obtained by processing the song based on the reverberation effect through a session window, and presenting a session message corresponding to the target song in a session interface. Through the method and the device, the reverberation effect can be added for the recorded song, the recorded song is beautified, and the singing experience of a user is improved.
title: Song processing method

abstract_text: Methods and systems of evaluating content using neural networks and models. Content to be evaluated is input into a system where it is processed using neural networks. A machine learning model then takes the processed content along with information regarding the context of the content and produces a prior score for each piece of content. The prior score is then used as an input to a Bayesian model, along with further information. The Bayesian model outputs predictions relating to the content, along with confidence levels associated with the predictions.
title: Methods and systems for evaluating content
Control method and control device for water treatment plants with agglomeration

assignee_name_orig: [{"assignee_name": "Shenzhen Institute of Advanced Technology of CAS"}]
assignee_name_current: [{"assignee_name": "\n    Shenzhen Institute of Advanced Technology of CAS\n  "}]
abstract_text: The embodiment of the application provides an addictive brain network analysis method and device. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring real brain functional nuclear magnetic resonance fMRI images of different labels; generating a first brain topological structure with different labels based on training a real brain fMRI image sample; generating a brain addiction standard characteristic diagram based on an addictive real brain fMRI image; determining an initial weight value of a first brain topological structure according to a brain addiction standard characteristic diagram; training an addictive brain network analysis model based on the first brain topological structure with different labels and the initial weight value of the first brain topological structure; inputting fMRI image samples of the test real brain into an addictive brain network analysis model to generate a first weighted brain topology. The method can effectively learn the topological characteristics of the abnormal brain related to addiction, thereby accurately analyzing the brain network of the addictive brain and improving the overall performance of the model.
title: Addictive brain network analysis method and device

assignee_name_orig: [{"assignee_name": "Shanghai Yitu Network Science and Technology Co Ltd"}]
assignee_name_current: [{"assignee_name": "\n    Shanghai Yitu Network Science and Technology Co Ltd\n  "}]
abstract_text: The application discloses a clothing identification method, a device, equipment and a medium, which belong to the technical field of image identification, and the method comprises the steps of receiving a clothing identification request aiming at an image to be identified; carrying out human body detection on the image to be recognized, and segmenting a target figure image containing a figure from the image to be recognized according to a detection result; acquiring information of a part to be identified, and segmenting a local area image corresponding to the information of the part to be identified in the target figure image; respectively matching the local area image with each acquired uniform image sample to obtain matched uniform image samples; and determining the uniform type correspondingly set by the matched uniform image sample as a clothes identification result. Therefore, the clothing identification can be carried out on the appointed part of the clothing of the user, the clothing identification accuracy is improved, and the labor cost is reduced.
title: Clothing identification method, device, equipment and medium
